attributes.action: Reduce University tuition fees for postgraduate students
attributes.background: Reduce university tuition fees for all postgraduate students, as an effect of the COVID-19 pandemic.

rejection.details:
Decisions about fees for postgraduate degrees are a matter for individual universities, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Introduce a One-Off Postgraduate Study Grant: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330806

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
